biotools.summary: Unique bioinformatics resource that compiles comprehensive information about common or ubiquitous toxins and their toxin-targets. Each record (ToxCard) contains over 80 data fields providing detailed information on chemical properties and descriptors, toxicity values, protein and gene sequences (for both targets and toxins), molecular and cellular interaction data, toxicological data, mechanistic information and references.

bioschemas.name: T3DB
